As Li Yan begins to go through more hardships in life, she starts to understand how things were from her mother`s perspective back then.

programme.title: Crime A Ramatuelle
programme.desc: Sebastien Lacassagne, a young owner of a vineyard, is found murdered. The prosecutor elisabeth Richard and Captain Martinez launch an investigation. programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 24
programme.desc: The Azzedine Alaia Foundation invites us behind the scenes of the major couturier and his legend. All about the origins of the word ''vintage''. programme.title: Gardez Le Sourire
programme.desc: Vienna in the 1930s. Jean has no work and nowhere to live. He is so desperate that he thinks about drowning himself in the Danube. But a young woman, Marie, jumps off a bridge just before him. Jean saves her and comforts her. Suicide is never an option again.

programme.title: Allegresse
programme.desc: Whilst he's supposed to be looking after his daughter, with whom he isn't particularly close, a funeral director is entrusted with the ashes of a complete unknown. Together they try to find a way to pay tribute to the deceased and end up forging unexpected ties...

programme.title: En Piste !

programme.title: A La Recherche Du Legume Star - EP 2

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 4
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 3
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 3
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam Et Julia - EP 8
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 25
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 8
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Riviere A L'envers - EP 7
programme.desc: The children arrive before the Great Mist, the final obstacle protecting the Qjar River from intruders. Entering it means being lost forever in a fog so thick that it swallows all who venture there. But Tomek and Hannah have no intention of giving up so close to their goal.

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 43
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: En Attendant Un Miracle
programme.desc: Lourdes, early morning. Dr Delubac's body is discovered in a pool in the Grotto of the Apparitions, where pilgrims come to immerse themselves. He was a member of the CMIL that validates whether a cure is miraculous. A meeting was planned for the next day, to rule on certain dossiers..

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 1
programme.desc: Audre?e lives in an 18th-century country house that has remained intact. On Nuns' Island, the service station designed by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe is a jewel of modern architecture. And gold leaves hold no secrets for Marie-France Kech

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 11
programme.desc: Homeland of kilt and whisky, Scotland is a concentration of traditions, myths and places both unique and mysterious. With 31,000 freshwater lakes, 282 mountain summits and 790 islands, it offers an incredible variety of landscapes. A land without limits, where the horizon stretches as far as the eye can see...

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 14
programme.desc: Maxime Le Flaguais and Iannicko N'Doua explore Nimes, a city with a particularly rich history. Ahead of them lies a busy programme filled with gastronomy, culture, history and outdoor activities.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 20
programme.desc: The Cluny Museum recounts mediaeval art. Gastronomy on a plate with chef Victor Mercier: you don't need to travel far to discover new horizons! Bold, powerful and always sublime, Saint Laurent artistic director Anthony Vaccarello transforms women. Creations by ceramist Charlotte Castro.

programme.title: Zombi Child
programme.desc: Haiti, 1962. A man is brought back from the land of the dead and forced to work in the hell of the sugar cane plantations. Fifty-five years later, at the prestigious Legion d'Honneur boarding school in Paris, a Haitian teenager tells her new friends the secret that haunts her family...

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: #Investigation - EP 10
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Geopolitis is a programme which presents what are often complex international situations in a clear, precise and concise manner.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 8
programme.desc: 1 September 1939. Germany invades Poland, France and Great Britain declare war, Canada follows suit. The Second World War has begun and Canada's young men decide to enlist as volunteers. One such was evariste Lagace, Claude Legault's uncle.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 7
programme.desc: 1939. In Canada a woman's place was in the home, looking after her husband and children. But during the war, with the men away at the front, women were working and contributing to the war effort. For the first time society saw women differently: their emancipation had begun.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 10
programme.desc: In 2022, the 60 largest global banks invested 669 billion dollars in oil, gas and coal. How can we find out what our bank does with our money? Should we change bank to make an impact? We examine the answers with the economist Christel Dumas.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 2
programme.desc: Claude Legault heads to Monteregie, to find out more about a camp where some 37,000 German prisoners of war were held after being captured by the British and transferred to Canada. He meets Micheline Lanctot, whose parents developed close ties to one of the soldiers.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 1
programme.desc: Are all the paper bags in the supermarket fruit and veg section really made from recycled paper? What happens to the cardboard boxes thrown into the recycling bins? Hugo Clement explores the murky world of cardboard packaging, to discover that it's not quite as virtuous and environmentally-friendly as we think.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 23
programme.desc: In August 2022, Yann Quennet left his native Brittany to sail around the world single-handedly, aboard ''Baluchon'', a four metre yacht he built entirely by himself. Having left as a complete unknown, he and his minimalist adventures gradually won the hearts of the public via social media.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1566
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 1
programme.desc: Julien sets off to visit Jean-Luc Kanape living in the land of his ancestors, where he has built a small off-grid cabin. Guardian of this territory of the caribou, he shares with Julien his love of the forest and of handing down the ancestral knowledge of the Innu.

programme.title: Nos Ombres D'algerie
programme.desc: Sixty years on, can an image help us to understand the Algerian War? When faced with a traumatic event, silence becomes the instinctive choice. Illustrators look (back) at their family history using the graphic novel to give voice to the Algeria of their childhood, confronting the ghosts of their past.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 11
programme.desc: Michelin-star chef Arnaud Viel has his feet firmly in bucolic Normandy, between the Orne and the Perche Regional Natural Reserve. The famous Percherons, camemberts, ciders and many other products come from this little-known region. Arnaud Viel reveals these gourmet delights to us.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 1
programme.desc: Julien sets off to visit Jean-Luc Kanape living in the land of his ancestors, where he has built a small off-grid cabin. Guardian of this territory of the caribou, he shares with Julien his love of the forest and of handing down the ancestral knowledge of the Innu.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 23
programme.desc: In August 2022, Yann Quennet left his native Brittany to sail around the world single-handedly, aboard ''Baluchon'', a four metre yacht he built entirely by himself. Having left as a complete unknown, he and his minimalist adventures gradually won the hearts of the public via social media.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 25
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 39
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse - EP 13
programme.desc: Octave shows Marys the drawing he's done for the cover of a book about dinosaurs. Tyrannosaurus, brachiosaurus, herbivore: the words might seem complicated but they provide the perfect inspiration for a nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 27
programme.desc: The media personality Marina Orsini joins Charlie and Elliot to share her advice on getting back to your everyday routine as the festive season draws to a close.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 28
programme.desc: Whatever anyone says, you can choose your family by spending the festive season with friends. Charlie and Elliot welcome actors Leane Labreche-Dor and Olivier Gervais-Courchesne to discuss the subject.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 32
programme.desc: Alix is surprised to learn that Humpty-Dumpty thinks that he's an egg laid by a... spider. He even asks her to show him how to become one. She has great fun dressing him up and making him climb walls.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 11
programme.desc: Michelin-star chef Arnaud Viel has his feet firmly in bucolic Normandy, between the Orne and the Perche Regional Natural Reserve. The famous Percherons, camemberts, ciders and many other products come from this little-known region. Arnaud Viel reveals these gourmet delights to us.

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 5
programme.desc: Walk along the forgotten tracks in the Basque Country. Enthusiasts rediscover deserted paths, bring magnificent abandoned villas back to life or add a modern touch to local cuisine. In their way, they perpetuate historical memories.

programme.title: Gardez Le Sourire
programme.desc: Vienna in the 1930s. Jean has no work and nowhere to live. He is so desperate that he thinks about drowning himself in the Danube. But a young woman, Marie, jumps off a bridge just before him. Jean saves her and comforts her. Suicide is never an option again.

programme.title: Movie - Motta Siva Ketta Siva
programme.desc: Shivakumar IPS, a corrupt police officer, joins GK, a local politician, in his immoral activities. When GK's brother kills his best friend, he decides to turn his life around.

programme.title: Movie - Chennaieil Oru Naal
programme.desc: A star, a police officer and a journalist become involved in a major event at a traffic signal. When the journalist is hit by a car and declared brain dead, the star asks for the journalist's heart for his sick daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Kudumba Changili
programme.desc: Kudumba Sangili is a 1999 Tamil-language film directed by P. N. Ramachandar. The film stars the producer Kalaipuli G. Sekaran alongside Khushbu, while Manivannan plays a supporting role.

programme.title: Movie - Kulir 100
programme.desc: Surya's mother enrols him to an elite school in a bid to separate him from his rowdy past. Being a misfit, he only has Babloo and the principal's daughter by his side. Soon, Babloo is found dead.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Roja Kootam
programme.desc: Ilango and Sriram are close friends who fall in love with the same girl, Mano. However, things take a turn when Mano's marriage is fixed with another man.

programme.title: Movie - Aadukalam
programme.desc: Pettaikaaran is famous in his town for an impeccable track record of successes in rooster fights. When one of his aides, Karuppu, goes against his word in a fight, it leads to an enmity between them.

programme.title: Movie - Dagalty
programme.desc: Guru, a fraudster, is assigned the task to find a girl and take her to Vijay, a womaniser. Though Guru accomplishes his mission, he has a change of heart when he realises his love for her.

programme.title: Movie - Ellam Avan Seyal
programme.desc: Laxman Krishna, a criminal lawyer, manages to win all his cases. All the wrong-doers consider him as their god. But things change when he is assigned to defend the convicts who had murdered a girl.

programme.title: Movie - Bagheera
programme.desc: Building on his aversion to women, Bagheera, a hitman, creates a dubious application in order to kill women at anyone's request.

programme.title: Movie - Inga Enna Solludhu
programme.desc: A man is forced into an unwanted marriage in order to become rich quickly with his wife's money. However, his foolishness and misfortune push his wife to attempt suicide.

programme.title: Movie - Kuppi
programme.desc: After the assassination of a prominent leader, Shivrasan takes shelter in a house owned by Ranganath. When the police zero in on the hideout after thorough investigation, they get attacked.

programme.title: Movie - Maalai Pozhuthin Mayakathilaey
programme.desc: A real-time playout of events at a coffee shop over nearly two hours on a rainy evening. A married couple fight over the lack of romance in their lives, while it blossoms between two strangers just a table away.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Uyirodu Uyiraga
programme.desc: Ajay, a young man, is diagnosed with chronic brain tumour. He accepts his condition and lives a simple life, but Anjali, who loves his optimism, decides to lie to him in order to win his heart.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Pandi
programme.desc: To save his mother from a death sentence, Pandi kidnaps daughters of some high-profile people in society and demands his mother's release. He claims that she has been wrongly framed.

programme.title: Movie - Vazhve Mayam
programme.desc: Raja and Devi fall in love with each other and get engaged. However, when Raja learns that he is suffering from cancer, he hides it from Devi and calls off the engagement.

programme.title: Movie - Rhythm
programme.desc: Karthikeyan, a photo editor in Mumbai, is a widower whose parents wish to see him settled and happy. Chitra, a widow with a son, gives them hope, unaware that their pasts are intertwined.

programme.title: Movie - Friends
programme.desc: A man values his best friend more than anything else in the world. One day he confesses a dark secret from their childhood to his wife, which is overheard by another. Once the secret gets out, the friendship is destroyed.

programme.title: PL ePREMIER LEAGUE 2024/25: KNOCKOUT STAGES (Live)
programme.desc: Join us for coverage of knockout stages of the 2025 ePremier League finals.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 12
programme.desc: Jermain Defoe scored 162 Premier League goals, and it was at Tottenham where he was at his prolific best. The striker recalls his two spells with the North London club, including the memorable occasion where he hit 5 in one match.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 9
programme.desc: One of the Premier League's most electrifying talents, Jay Jay Okocha lit up English football in the early 2000s. The Nigerian reflects on his time at Bolton Wanderers, where he made an unforgettable impression on the league.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by Freddie Ljungberg to analyse and discuss the evolution of wingers down the years, and deep dive into what makes the perfect wideplayer.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 33
programme.desc: PL Stories takes an intimate look at the controversial and charismatic career of Nicklas Bendtner, exploring his rise to fame and the challenges that came with it. We follow Bendtner's journey from Premier League star to returning to his hometown in Denmark, where he reflects on his highs, lows, and the impact of his larger-than-life persona.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2009/2010 (GB: DROGBA)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: He scored 104 Premier League goals, making 55 assists in 254 English top flight matches for Chelsea. It's no wonder then that four time Premier League winner Didier Drogba has earned a seat amongst the top table elite, after being inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame. We talk to him and those that knew him best about what set him apart from others in the game, reflecting on his incredible career and his lasting legacy.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: We head to London to go behind the scenes at the Premier League Hall of fame event night and meet the three newest inductees to secure their place amongst English footballs elite!

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2019/2020 (LIV)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 16 MAR
programme.desc: Highlights of every Matchweek 29 fixture, includes the opening clash of the weekend with Everton hosting West Ham, rivals Arsenal and Chelsea face off in a London derby, and Leicester take on Manchester United at the King Power Stadium.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard joins former England teammate Owen Hargreaves to examine exactly what it takes to become an elite central midfielder.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 4
programme.desc: Luis Garcia and Gaizka Mendieta are presented with the challenge of deciding the greatest Spaniards to ever play in the Premier League.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 29
programme.desc: Relive the best action from the Premier League with this fast-paced ISO angle highlights show, featuring every game and every goal from each matchround.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by Freddie Ljungberg to analyse and discuss the evolution of wingers down the years, and deep dive into what makes the perfect wideplayer.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 31
programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL ePREMIER LEAGUE 2024/25: GRAND FINALS (Live)
programme.desc: Join us for coverage of the grand final of the 2025 ePremier League.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 31
programme.desc: After a nomadic start to his career, it now seems that Pervis Estupinan has found his footballing home at Brighton & Hove Albion. The Ecuadorian international takes The Big Interview to the beachfront where he talks about influence of a former professional in the family while growing up, how playing in Spain helped him to become the Premier League performer he is today and his excitement for the future playing under Fabian Hurzeler.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 20
programme.desc: PL Stories looks into the extraordinary journey of Emmanuel Adebayor, from his prolific Premier League career with Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, and Crystal Palace, to the harrowing experience of surviving the Togo bus attack in 2010. We dive deep into his rise as one of Africa's finest football talents, and how the near-death tragedy profoundly impacted his life, shaping his resilience and outlook beyond the game.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 33
programme.desc: PL Stories takes an intimate look at the controversial and charismatic career of Nicklas Bendtner, exploring his rise to fame and the challenges that came with it. We follow Bendtner's journey from Premier League star to returning to his hometown in Denmark, where he reflects on his highs, lows, and the impact of his larger-than-life persona.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 38
programme.desc: After a meteoric rise through Cardiff's youth system, Aaron Ramsey's dream of playing for one of the world's biggest clubs was realised. But just as his career was reaching new heights, a devastating double leg break threatened to bring it all crashing down. The Wales captain takes us through his footballing journey to date.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51
programme.desc: Season 2023 - 2024 has arguably been the greatest since the birth of the Premier League in 1992. Three elite teams racing to the finish line. Each of them believing this season will end in glory. The script of the story is captivating. Manchester City going for an historic fourth consecutive Premier League title. Arsenal looking for their first title in twenty years following their late season collapse in 2023.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (GB: HAALAND)
programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2023/24 in a Premier League season where there's been a record number of goals scored.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 5
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by title winning captains Tim Sherwood and Wes Morgan to relive the two greatest underdog stories of the Premier League era.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen is the latest guest in the PL Moments hotseat as he chooses the top ten days from his Premier League career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypiä's journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernán Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former Chelsea and Tottenham midfielder Gus Poyet chooses the best eleven teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 2
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by Premier League winners Owen Hargreaves and Peter Schmeichel to discuss the best title-winning teams in the Premier League era. Expect insightful anecdotes, interesting archive and lively debate across a packed hour-long programme.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51

programme.title: FS MMA Chris Ligouri vs. Erik Oganov
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Brutal knees tell the tale of this fight between two warriors hell bent on victory when Erik Oganov takes on Chris Liguori in a lightweight matchup.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Gerry Penalosa vs. Jhonny Gonzalez
programme.desc: This episode features Jhonny Gonzalez defending his WBO bantamweight title against Gerry Penalosa, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Abi, Tamawashi, Takarafuji and Mitakeumi from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 6: Bandung, Indonesia - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Pencak Silat and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet, Throws and Weapons featuring Masters Rita Suwanda and Dadang Gunawan.

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 Joel Julio vs.James Kirkland
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Super Welterweight, 10 Round contest featuring Joel Julio (34-2, 31 KOs) vs.undefeated James Kirkland, aka 'Mandingo Warrior' (24-0, 21 KOs) from the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California, USA on March 3, 2009.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roy Jones Jr. vs. Glenn Thomas
programme.desc: At the time of this matchup of two undefeated Middleweights, Roy Jones Jr. was gaining attention as one of the most exciting young fighters in the sport and steadily climbing up the rankings, in the top ten across the four main sanctioning bodies. He faces Glenn Thomas, 24-0, who travelled to Jones' hometown of Pensacola, Florida in a meeting that would bring a shot at the World Title for the winner.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman taking on Carlos Quintana. Also on the card, kickboxing super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita faces off against Brice Guidon.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Travel to the Miami, Florida to witness fitness fanatics face off in the Southeast finals. 30 contestants from across the region have arrived to the tropical coastal city, and the competition is heating up! All these athletes aspire to advance to the nationals in Las Vegas, where Mount Midoriyama waits, and the winner receives half a million dollars plus the coveted title of American Ninja Warrior. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Isidro Ranoni Prieto
programme.desc: From the Lac Leamy Casino in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, NABA Light Heavyweight Champion Artur Beterbiev looks to continue his streak of knockout victories and secure a shot at the World Title as he steps into the ring against Isidro Ranoni Prieto (26-1, 22 KOs). Beterbiev, the Russian Olympian and Gold Medalist from the World Championships in Milan, enters the fight with a record of 10-0, not allowing any of his opponents to reach the final bell.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Tayfun Ozcan vs Mohamed Khamal
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from the Martini Plaza in Groningen, the Netherlands, features main event Tayfun Ozcan (Turkey) vs. Mohamed Khamal (Morocco).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Shodai, Takakeisho, Ryuden and Aoiyama from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau visits Germany where a port is working on the ultimate sustainable solution, and travels to Kenya and Greenland to learn how art and living in harmony can help humans.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue. This is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S4 - EP 1
programme.desc: How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear. Two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Poisoning the Amazon. Aluminium in Ford's new electric F-150 can be traced back to bauxite mines in the Amazon whose owners have long faced allegations of pollution and land appropriation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The World From Above S1
programme.desc: A highly popular, breathtaking series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft down to just a few feet above the ground, we discover new perspectives through thrilling journeys: from mountains and the world's most picturesque cities, to fantastic castles and the great natural wonders of the globe.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda
programme.desc: Nunung is a rich widow who has an only child (Anita Hara). Nunung already has a husband-to-be and wants to get married but is embarrassed because Anita hasn't gotten married yet. Meanwhile, Anita, who also has a husband-to-be (Bedu), doesn't want to get married if her mother (Nunung) isn't married yet.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

programme.title: Cahaya Ramadan
programme.desc: An Islamic Talkshow program that is studied in depth with a Doctor of Philosophy, Fahrudin Faiz, the pioneer of "Ngaji Filsafat" and hosted by Maman Suherman or commonly called "Kang Maman".

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Life Hacks
programme.desc: DIY projects are not that difficult, you need to find an interesting one to start creating your own. To help you, here we bring you a few fantastic inspirations.

programme.title: Indonesia Art Talk
programme.desc: A program that will show the artwork of every talented artist with all the achievements obtained. extraordinary work will amaze the audience.

programme.title: Art See Asia
programme.desc: Over 48 hours, the host engages in art challenges, participates in an exclusive masterclass and experiences lesser-known local art sounds and sights. The series Art.See.Asia will give an exclusive and atmospheric insight into the art scene of Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Bangkok, Jakarta and Taipei. For art and travel enthusiasts, Art.See.Asia is the ultimate insight into the cities' thriving art culture!

programme.title: Behind The Creators
programme.desc: Behind The Creators is a program about the process behind the works that produced by content creators. Starting from the idea, the production process, the results, and evaluating the work.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Woman's Diary
programme.desc: Revealing the lives of noble-hearted Indonesian socialite women. Seeing that many people like luxury lifestyle content, this program will tell how the luxury lifestyle becomes meaningful.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Beyond Boundaries

How much fun they have riding motorbikes, the community, and how the people around them respond.

programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Where We Call Home

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Afuso Michie is a Japanese-Brazilian woman who runs a center in Kanagawa Prefecture that offers Japanese language classes and other services which help foreign residents find their footing.

programme.title: 1/30: People With Mental Illness
programme.desc: 1 in 30 Japanese suffer from mental illness. We follow a woman who finds it hard to do simple tasks due to her illness, as she goes to rehabilitation for returning to work.

programme.title: 1/10: Married By Matching Apps
programme.desc: 1 in 10 Japanese got married through online spouse-hunting services in 2020. We interview women who use matchmaking apps, including Manami, who uses multiple apps to find a perfect partner.

programme.title: 1/1000: Lay Judges
programme.desc: 1 in 1000 Japanese have experience as a lay judge in court cases. We witness a networking event for former lay judges, where they discuss unique experiences. What does it feel like to judge others?

programme.title: Sing For Ukraine, Sing For Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: We showcase "Documentary 360," a program that highlights high school peace messengers dedicated to sharing the atomic bomb's tragedy with the world.

programme.title: 1/2: People Who Don'T Drink
programme.desc: 1 in 2 don't drink in Japan, where intense social drinking is normal. Through interviews of drinkers and non-drinkers we hear both sides, including a couple who went sober and opened a no-alcohol bar.

programme.title: 1/50: People Who Lost A Newborn
programme.desc: 1 in 50 families have lost a child during pregnancy or soon after birth. A couple who lost their second son when two hours old talks about their grief and sorrow, a topic often not discussed in Japan.

programme.title: 1/156: Transgenders
programme.desc: 1 in 156 Japanese are transgenders. In a society still lacking in understanding, we talk to transgender people about work, marriage, leisure, as they try to live their normal daily lives.

programme.title: Sing For Ukraine, Sing For Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.desc: We showcase "Documentary 360," a program that highlights high school peace messengers dedicated to sharing the atomic bomb's tragedy with the world.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: The Star Festival
programme.desc: For the annual Tanabata Star Festival, families across Edo flew bamboo stalks adorned with strips of paper and ornaments representing wishes. We examine what their wishes tell us about their lives.

programme.title: 1/45: Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

programme.title: 1/27: People Without Smartphones
programme.desc: 1 in 27 people don't own a smartphone. We follow a man who chose not to own one, and his reason not to. What has he gained in life by giving up his smartphone, a modern-day necessity and obsession?

programme.title: 1/2500: New Farmers
programme.desc: 1 in 2500 people started farming in 2022. As we talk to new farmers who've come from totally different industries, we examine the values they have found in this labor-intense yet rewarding field.

programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2517
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: What If - EP 5
programme.desc: Regular girl Xia Guo is faced with a dilemma. Would she choose to live a home-sweet-home life with her boyfriend in her hometown, or seize the opportunity to forge a successful career in a big city?

programme.title: Journey to Jianghu
programme.desc: Wayne Lai goes on a journey to unveil classic locations from martial arts novels, offering viewers a blend of cultural exploration and martial arts appreciation!

programme.title: Travel Buddies - Happy Hong Kong
programme.desc: In recent years, Evergreen Mak Cheung-ching has been focusing on development in the Mainland. On his rare return to Hong Kong, he gathers his close friends to revisit old places, while looking for new places to appreciate the changes in Hong Kong over the years!

programme.title: Shock Mystery
programme.desc: This show documents strange happenings from all over the world, all of which cannot be explained from a point of view accepted by ordinary people. Explore incredible mysteries that not only existed in the past, but still exist today!

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Song of Youth - EP 36
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun is the daughter of a once-powerful government official. After being accused of corruption, her father and the rest of the family fall from grace. To make ends meet, she joins a troupe of travelling performers, but intends to avenge those who wronged her family.

programme.title: News At 18:30 and Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Gourmet Express

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.desc: The period drama revolves around mathematician Shuai Jia Mo who stumbles upon an old accounting issue in the local municipal level. While attempting to correct the mistake, he triggers tension with upper government officials.

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 10
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 7
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1912
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 584
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 14
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 22
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 24
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 25
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Simple Days - EP 2
programme.desc: Gu Moli and Zhu Jincao struggled all the way from their hometown to set up a family of two in Shanghai. The marriage brought another problem that should not have been a problem - how they get along with their parents.

programme.title: Simple Days - EP 3
programme.desc: Gu Moli and Zhu Jincao struggled all the way from their hometown to set up a family of two in Shanghai. The marriage brought another problem that should not have been a problem - how they get along with their parents.

programme.desc: Chinese-American SWAT team captain Wei Xiao Chen (Chrissie Chau) destroys the base of a human trafficking syndicate, and discovers the body of a woman who turns out to be her twin sister. She is devastated and vows to track down the truth of the murder.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1913
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 25
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 26
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Angel In-the-Making - EP 23
programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 4
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Triumph in the Skies II - EP 43
programme.desc: SAMUEL TONG (Francis Ng) stays in the UK to spend a long vacation following his wife's death. After encountering HOLIDAY HO (Fala Chen), a wanderer who just got dumped, he ends his vacation early and returns to Hong Kong, joining Skylette Airlines as a pilot to fly again. He meets Captain JAYDEN KOO (Julian Cheung), and the two exhibit two distinct personalities, with SAMUEL being reserved and JAYDEN being a man who likes to attract attention.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 1
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 33
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit people’s superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 34

programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 5
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 2
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 3
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FU’s real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit people’s superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry.
